articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.title: Helldivers 2 has received 100000 negative reviews since announcing players must link Steam to a PSN account - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Helldivers 2's Steam reviews have tanked since announcing the need to link Steam to PSN, but Arrowhead say it's Sony's fault and they're on players' side.
articles.content: Earlier this week, Helldivers 2 players on PC were told that they'd soon need to link their Steam account to a PlayStation Network (PSN) account. Two days later and the game has received 100,000 new … [+2649 chars]

articles.author: Alex Kalinauckas
articles.title: F1 Miami GP: Verstappen fends off Leclerc for pole again - Autosport
articles.description: Max Verstappen beat Charles Leclerc to take pole position for Formula 1’s 2024 Miami Grand Prix, with both drivers failing to set their best times on their final qualifying laps.
articles.content:
Verstappen posted a 1m27.241s to lead Leclerc by 0.141-seconds on the first runs in Q3, where they were trailed by Carlos Sainz in the other Ferrari.
On the final runs, although Verstappen set the s… [+2052 chars]

articles.title: Scientists discover remains of a 'buried planet' deep within the Earth - UNILAD
articles.description: A so-called buried planet was discovered by scientists last year and scientists hope proves the theory that planet Theia once crashed into Earth
articles.content:
We'll long be learning about planets and the solar system, but so far scientists have found some pretty amazing discoveries.

articles.description: It's May 4, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor is available with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate via EA Play and with Free Play days — here's more reasons why you should play!
